EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Russell, I asked around and it was agreed that the best CRM tool for a small one man shop like yourself is constant contact www.constantcontact.com Let me know what you think about this, it’s pretty affordable and automates a lot of the process.
